ComicInfo.Summary:
As Scarlett heads off to Cybertron to confront the events of First Strike, her G.I. Joe team on Earth faces an unusual enemy… V.E.N.O.M.! With the help of a former M.A.S.K. member, G.I. Joe looks to put an end to Miles Mayhem’s sinister group once and for all, in the Greatest Crossover One-Shot Of All Time!
*List of covers and their creators:* Cover | Name | Creator(s) | Sidebar Location | -------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- A | Cover A | Drew Johnson (a) & David Garcia Cruz (c) | 1 | B | Cover B | Ilias Kyriazis | 2 | RI | 1:10 Retailer Incentive Cover | Whilce Portacio (a) & Thomas Deer (c) | 3 |
ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with the ninjas.walk.alone fork of ComicTagger 1.3.5 using info from Comic Vine on 2024-06-12 19:23:29. [CVDB622698]

ComicInfo.Characters: Bruno Sheppard, Cobra Commander, Cover Girl, Dial Tone, Doc, Firefly, Grand Slam, Gung-Ho, Lifeline, Miles Mayhem, Optimus Prime, Polly, Quick-Kick, Rock & Roll, Salvo, Shipwreck, Skywarp, Sylvester Rax
